alert.note: Alert for Washington (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 15 at 5:54PM MDT until August 15 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Southeastern Washington County in southwestern Utah...Specifically for the Hildale area... * Until 700 PM MDT. * At 554 PM MDT, local law enforcement reported that flood waters are continuing to cross roads in the city of Hildale and those roads remain closed at this time. Therefor, the Flash Flood Warning has been extended for this area. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, and streets. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Hildale. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Remain alert for flooding even in locations not receiving rain. Dry washes, streams, and rivers can become raging killer currents in a matter of minutes, even from distant rainfall.
